snippet: Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Jovan Belcher spent some of his final hours sleeping in his car outside the home of another woman whom he described as his “girlfriend,” the police said Tuesday.
abstract: Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Jovan Belcher had been found by police officers sleeping in his car outside a woman's home just hours before he shot and killed his girlfriend Kasandra Perkins and himself; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Jovan Belcher spent some of his final hours sleeping in his car outside the home of another woman whom he described as his “girlfriend,” the police said Tuesday.

headline.main: Before Deaths, Belcher Found in Car
headline.print_headline: Before Deaths, Belcher Found in Car
